    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class ConfigProvider

    Provides global access to the current simulation configuration. The configuration is set once at startup and the mutable sections can be modified at runtime for live balancing.

    Inheritance
    object
    ConfigProvider
    Inherited Members
